type: Maintenance and support for Symantec software
short_summary: Purchase of maintenance and support for Symantec software and related technical specifications.
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of maintenance and support for Symantec software and related technical specifications.  Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to: a. view and access solicitations from SSC; b. submit a response to a solicitation; c. receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations; d. be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments; and e. submit invoices and receive payment status updates. To register, please go to https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login and click  Register Now.  SSC Symantec Support and Maintenance for CSA- Amendment 000
full_summary:
**Symantec Support and Maintenance for CSA**
=================
### Issue Summary

Shared Services Canada is soliciting proposals for the purchase of maintenance and support for Symantec software.

### Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** [BPM021279/26269](mailto:BPM021279/26269)
*   **Publication Date:** April 9, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 25, 2024 at 14h:00 (Eastern Time)
*   **Region:** Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
*   **Procurement Category:** *GD*
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Goods and Service Category:** ADP Software
*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
*   **End User:** Shared Services Canada
*   **Points of Contact:**
    *   **Contact Name:** Clara Whittaker
    *   **Email:** Not available
    *   **Phone:** 343-553-8354
    *   **Fax:** 343-553-8354
    *   **Address:** 180 Kent St, Ottawa Ontario K1P 0B6
*   **Additional Information:**
    *   The tender is not available online.
    *   You may register for access through the SSC P2P portal at [Supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca).
    *   Direct any inquiries about the tender to the point of contact listed above.
